#summary How to add Windows 98 support
#labels Phase-Support,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Design

= Why not? = 
  * Instability
  * Age
  * Usage
  * Not modern

= How? = 
  # Open up the extracted project in Visual C# 2005
  # Remove skinning
  # Remove the Krypton Controls
  # Set all the ToolStrips RenderMode to System
  # Change the form's inhertance to {{{Form}}}.
  # Remove all references to Krypton.
  # Compile.
